name: IRS'isnt
description:
Tax evasion has never been so fun! Kill as many tax agents as possible. They will catch you, but if you spend your money they can't take it right?

How to play

- Keyboard - WASD - Move, Mouse - Aim, Left-Click - Shoot, Space - Buy

- Gamepad - Left Stick - Move, Right Stick - Aim, Right Trigger - Shoot, South Button - Buy

Software Used

- Unity 2022.1.0b14.2951 / VS Code

- Audacity / FL Studio (Not really, almost got to audio)

- Krita / MS Paint

Ludum Dare 50 - Jacob McGowan
